result.formatted_address: The Pavilion, UG Level, The Murray, Hong Kong, a Niccolo Hotel, 22 Cotton Tree Dr, Central, Hong Kong
result.name: Guo Fu Lou

reviews.text: The best restaurant in hong kong for chinese food

Guo Fu Luo serves all different kinds of food from all over the world. The technology at this restaurant makes the whole experience fantastic because of their robots. The robots work in the restaurant. They carry food, but some carry specific food. You can even play games on their little iPad's. To keep kids entertained, they put a small TV through a table. Lots of Chinese families go to this restaurant.The restaurant's walls are traditional. The service is special every year. If the restaurant staff sees you every year, they will award you a prize for being a repeating customer. They give you a card, then they drop the price to about 15% off. Another thing that is significant about the restaurant is how kind the people are. So everything about this restaurant Guo Fu Lou, will tempt your taste buds. In my opinion, the service is a lifetime of enjoyment. Its recognized as the best restaurant in Hong Kong.

Guo Fu Lou has maintained a high standard of traditional Chinese cuisine since its relocation from Wan Chai. Steamed rice in lotus leaf is still the highlight: the rice has flavour sufficiently absorbed and right amount of moisture, mixed with diced chicken and roasted goose to give an extra layer of texture and taste, toppings of crab meat and dried scallop make this delicacy refreshing and complete.

The old location is more old fashioned and secluded. In here, at the heart of Central with the Hong Kong Park and colonial buildings nearby, the atmosphere is both upscale and cozy. The venue is decorated with large amount of glass, even on part of the ceiling, basically every table can have a piece of the dazzling surrounding scene.
Dishes are expensive, food and service was great.
Newly relocated. Still very good!

result.name: Guo Fu Lou

reviews.text: Good Food, Good service
Great service and staffs. Though the price for the food you get is too expensive in my opinion.

It is certainly nice, and the price certainly reflects that. However, for a Michelin Starred restaurant, I was somewhat underwhelmed. The presentation was not particularly impressive or refined. The food was good but nothing extraordinary. Not sure how it scored that star to be honest...
Very good quality dim sum. Bbq pork and steamed pork dumpling are recommended. Very expensive though.
Not same standard as before

result.name: 國福樓

reviews.text: 其三「水溶性纤维」:水溶性纤维每天食用应40克，纤维有分水溶性和非水熔性，水溶性纤维包括燕麦、米槺、小麦、豆类（Beans & Pulses）及果菜。有些広告标榜麦皮含水容性纤维，但如只吃麦皮要达到40克水融性纤维标準，每天起碼要進食超過10碗麥皮才足夠。所以應分散投資，即除了麥皮每天還要吃至少五種蔬果，并将吃白面包习惯改为吃全榖物面包，煮餸或煲汤时多用不同豆类作配菜，如豌豆、红腰豆、鹰咀豆、毛豆、青豆、蠶豆、納豆、黑豆等;其四「大豆蛋白質」:大豆蛋白質每天攝取50克，這是最後一種但又最具挑戰性一個食物群組。大家都知道豆腐屬於大豆類食物，但一盒豆漿也只有约8克蛋白质，要达标必需吃到一定分量。所以PD建议，最初庇以15至25克为短期目标，习惯后才快慢增加分量。食物选择方面，除了豆浆还可以多吃豆腐、豆腐花，或煮黄豆苦瓜汤，除了喝汤也要吃汤渣！
環境優美，食物質素好，雖然價錢超貴
精緻粵菜，價位高但美味，只接待預約客人，服務品質佳，一星米其林
Good Food, Good service
Great service and staffs. Though the price for the food you get is too expensive in my opinion.
